mapper.select: SELECT U.ID AS systemUserId, U.USERNAME AS username, O.ID AS officeId, O.NAME AS officeName, D.ID AS deptId , D.NAME AS deptName, P.ID AS positionId, P.NAME AS positionName FROM SYSTEM_USER AS U INNER JOIN SYSTEM_POSTION AS P ON P.ID = U.SYSTEM_POSITION_ID INNER JOIN SYSTEM_DEPART AS D ON D.ID = P.SYSTEM_DEPART_ID INNER JOIN SYSTEM_OFFICE AS O ON O.ID = D.SYSTEM_OFFICE_ID WHERE O.ID = #{office}
